data.eml:eml: A new species of Elpidium (Crustacea, Ostracoda) from bromeliads in Cusuco National Park, Honduras

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pinto, Ricardo L., Jocque, Merlijn (2013): A new species of Elpidium (Crustacea, Ostracoda) from bromeliads in Cusuco National Park, Honduras. ZooKeys 313: 45-59, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.313.4904, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.313.4904
